website_summaries.verdict: An affordable digital ballast for budget-conscious buyers wanting a good grow light.
pros: Metal casing effectively sheds heat in combination with the built-in internal fan
Digital ballast is dimmable with the correct bulb type, making it easy to get the necessary lumens
cons: The ballast has some compatibility issues with certain lamp and fixture types

HPS and MH. won't strike an arc. unfortunately I am past the return date. so I just wasted my money with no options for return... I'm an experienced licensed industrial electrician. this was not due to user error. DO NOT BUY
